name: Pakker Inc.
tag_list: optical-transceiver, cisco-transceiver, cisco-sfp, gbic-transceiver, xfp-transceiver, cwdm-transceiver
overview: Silicon Valley based Pakker Inc. is the premier supplier for Cisco, HP-3Com, Avaya, Dell and other OEM compatible optical transceivers. We also do custom designs for advanced requirements. Pakker’s product is superior quality and backed by an unwavering commitment to the Customer experience. Our Customers can be assured of a straight line focus on flawless execution of their needs … that is the Pakker way. Passion for the Customer carries over into our corporate citizenship. Doing our share to protect the Environment is a key segment of that responsibility. The entire line of Pakker products is RoHS-6 compliant. In the daily operations, we are driven to eliminate wasteful practices, resulting in efficiency gains that benefit both the Environment and Customers. Pakker’s ‘Do No Evil’ philosophy is the driving force in all actions and decision making. We value investment and relationships over short term expediency. Join us on the journey, we look forward to serving you.
